Sentencas: Oxygen reduction reaction is crucial for the development of intermediate/low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), thus the development of cathode materials with high catalytic activity and stability is still a great challenge for the commercialization of SOFC.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: In this study, a series of La1-x PrxCo0.5Ni0.5O3-delta(x = 0.5, 0.75, and 1.0) perovskite oxides were prepared as oxygen reduction reaction catalysts for SOFC.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: First, the polycrystalline powders were synthesized by a Pechini method, and the crystal structure was confirmed as orthorhombic symmetry with Pbnm (No. 62) space group.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: Second, it was found that PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-delta (PCN) presents the best electrochemical performance among the three compounds.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: The polarization impedance of PCN was 0.0383 Omega cm(2) and the peak power density reached 1.47 W cm(2) using wetted hydrogen as fuel and air as the oxidant measured at 850 degrees
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: C. Meanwhile, the single cell with PCN as the cathode could stably work for 100 h at 750 degrees C without damping.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: Finally, combined with the first-principles calculations, it was revealed that the doping of Pr ion can effectively reduce oxygen vacancy formation energy and mainly changed the valence states of Co and Ni ions at B-site.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode

Sentencas: Therefore, PCN is expected to be a promising cathode material for SOFC.
Titulo: Highly Efficient and Stable Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using PrCo0.5Ni0.5O3-δ Cathode
